---------------------[Jason's...Honest review!]------------------------------
Hey guys this is a review of Portal 1!Or just Portal..Or Portal..2..now that Portal story Mel is out....anyways!This game has interesting puzzles and really makes you think unlike 2012-2016 games just make you tap your left trigger and right then scream happily-Wait what?This can make you do that on Console..?*Page flip noises*...*Ahem*Anyways in 2008-ish this was time of the century...and uhh..*Faded*Why is there a smudge here?A brownie?Seriously?*Proper*There..for?This game makes you go:'Wow mum!Buy me this!'And the price is only..7.46 pounds?(10$)Uhm..anyways this game has fun commands that let you noclip...and...*Page rustling*and...let's you-{SPOILER CENSORE}-so that's cool?Any ways..in the end...this is a really fun game where you can spawn Half-Life NPCs and weapons..for some odd reason but same engine.
---------------------[In the end rating:...8/10!!]------------------------------

A unique game, with unique strategies and puzzles. With a first person look, you control a girl who is able to create portals with a futuristic gun, and you have to struggle through diferent rooms with obstacles, while being watched by the creepy but friendly A.I. GlaDOS. Even the sentry guns in this game are cute. If you haven't played it, you don't know what you are missing. Get it on the sales, and it will only cost you a couple of euros. Totally worth it.

Tout simplement grace aux 3 points suivants ;

*Univers d'half-life 2 (en effet on entand des sons provenant d'hl2 de plus les deux jeux sont liés.)
*Des bon puzzles; simples mais pas trop, juste ce qu'il faut.
*Le portal gun !!! (c'est le coeur du jeu, c'est juste énorme)

[u] [h1] [b] Conclusion : [/b] [/h1] [/u]
Très bon jeu comme je l'ai dit au début de l'éval, seul bémol pas assez d'heures de jeu. Je le recommande ! (aux fans d'hl2 ou même aux fans de puzzle.)

Portal is a classic game that IMHO ages well. It doesn't rely on visual appeal (which can become dated as technology progresses), rather, the appeal comes from interesting but easy to understand game mechanics and good level design, which makes the levels challenging yet not frustrating. Great lines, voice acting, and ending makes the game even better, and in addition, the developer commentary is also informative (without being boring). Very good value for money, highly recommended.

1 (18 1/4 ounce) package chocolate cake mix
1 (12 ounce) can coconut pecan frosting
3⁄4 cup vegetable oil
7 egg whites
1 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips
3⁄4 cup butter or 3⁄4 cup margarine, melted
2⁄3 cup granulated sugar
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
2 cups all-purpose flour
2⁄3 cup cocoa powder
1⁄4 teaspoon baking soda
1 teaspoon salt
1⁄4 teaspoon baking powder
1⁄3 cup water
2 (12 ounce) cans vanilla frosting
8 maraschino cherries

The night before, mix 2/3c cocoa powder with 1.5 cans of vanilla frosting. Save the remaining half can of vanilla frosting for later.
Next day: remove mixed frosting and vanilla frosting from the fridge and set to the side. Also place the cherries and chocolate chips to the side. They will not be used until the cake is completely done.
Pre-heat over to 375 degrees F.
Lightly butter two 9 inch cake pans.
In one bowl combine all remaining dry ingredients.
In larger bowl, combine all liquid ingredients and egg whites. Mix thoroughly.
Slowly sift dry ingredients into the large bowl of liquid ingredients. Mix thoroughly.
Pour half of the batter into one prepared cake pan, and the rest into the second cake pan.
Cook for 30+ minutes, until a knife can be removed cleanly from the cake.
When done cooking, allow the cake to cool for at least one hour.
Remove top quarter inch from one cake round. Basically, let it have a completely flat top so that the second layer can rest smoothly on top. I suggest using a bread knife.
Use the coconut frosting as the inner layer.
Place second layer on top of first layer.
Frost with the cocoa powder mixed frosting. Warning: this stuff is stiff, so it takes a little work.
Coat entire cake with chocolate chips, press them lightly into the frosting to get them to stay. The recipe suggests one cup, I would suggest just taking from the bag. Measurements are just suggestions for chocolate chips.
Using the remaining vanilla frosting and a tablespoon, dallop eight circles around the top of the cake.
Place the eight cherries on top of the eight vanilla frosting circles.
Treat your friends to a meal of Lies and Deceit. ^.^.
我一直认为我没有3D眩晕 直到我遇到了传送门

Me ha encantado, en todos los sentidos.

La idea del juego es bastante sencilla, en cierto modo, pero a la vez es compleja. Los puzzles propuestos giran en torno a unas mecánicas simples que se aprenden rápidamente, lo que hace que no resulte aparatoso resolverlos - Ojo, que sean simples las mecánicas no quiere decir que los puzzles no requieran de un esfuerzo por parte del jugador para darse cuenta de qué debe hacer. 

La historia no tiene mayor complicación: eres un sujeto de pruebas trabajando para una empresa cuya cara visible es el genial robot GLADOS (el cual aporta todo el humor del juego). Vas superando distintos puzzles para conseguir tu ansiado premio: el pastel (jejejejeje). No obstante, que el argumento no sea complejo no implica que el tema de la obra no lo sea. Me parece una gran creación sobre revolución, sobre ir contra el sistema que nos usa como individuos para el bien del colectivo vendiéndonos la idea de que en algún momento reciviremos una recompensa que ni siquiera oleremos. 

En definitiva, un juego divertido para el que no quiera pensar, y una gran alegoría para aquellos que busquen trascendencia en los argumentos.

PD: La canción de los créditos es la verdadera guinda de EL PASTEL.

This game is amazing, and I'm not just saying this beacause of it's unique idea of portals that allow a wonderful and complex gaming experience, but for the story which I personally really enjoyed. It was the perfect balance between comedy, great voice narration and puzzle. Recommended for everyone!
The only thing that I could say is that it's a bit short. I passed it in two hours. But in this case, the quality makes up for the lack of quantity.
So what are you waiting for?! Buy it! Worth it for sure!
Then go and get Portal two, which is even better! And they constantly do sales. So they end up really cheap.

This game was great fun to play. The humor alone is worth the buy! Beyond that, gameplay was thought provoking, yet not so much as to hinder the experience. Overall, Portal is a very good, although short game. The 19 levels available in story mode took me two and a half hours to complete, and so I recommend you play the single player story in one sitting.

Un gioco che ha fatto la storia, che ti fa fare un trip mentale così violento da volerlo giocare ancora, ancora e ANCORA, veramente una chicca da riprendere per quelle persone che non hanno avuto la possibilità di giocarlo.
Ringrazio un 2015-16 scarno di titoli che mi hanno dato la possibilità di orientarmi su giochini un po più vecchiotti. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
lati positivi: 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   immersivo.
   trama molto intrigante e accattivante .
   sfide sempre molto avvincenti (e a volte anche un po infami XD).
   sfide e contenuti "post end" (perchè in inglese fa figo ;) ).
   leggero, quindi  si può gioare anche senza "SUPER PC DA GAMING CON RAFFREDDAMENTO A LIQUIDO".
   costa uno sputo. 
   vi fate una cultura videoludica a 360 gradi ;).
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
lati negativi:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   la grafica ormai ha i suoi anni sulle spalle (forse anche più di me XD). 
   non esiste coop o  multiplayer. 
   breve (ma intenso).
   che questi sono gli unici lati negativi che ho trovato :D.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I don't know how it took me this long to play this game, but I must say that it is one of the best experiences I've had with a game. The gameplay is a load of fun, and the game can be completed rather quickly. Not sure if I would spend $9.99 on this game, but with Portal being on sale at $1.99 at the time of this review being written, there is no reason not to buy it. Definitley one of the best games I've played in awhile, can't wait to buy Portal 2.

Overall this game is worth it weather its 10$ USD or you wait for a steam sale and its 99C USD it is 100% worth it.
